Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Gmoney> @miketout . I'm not asking when the new algo is exactly, but in more general terms, what's your target timeframe. Days, weeks or months? in 2018 or 2019 .. etc?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> @Gmoney it is likely final right now and working great üòÉ we are working on an announcement for significant GPU and FPGA bounties for devs who can make an open implementation that can beat CPUs. Release should be in the next 1-3 days, I believe. It is much more comprehensively designed for CPU advantage than VerusHash 1.0, which was relying only on the Haraka core for that purpose.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> Since I implied the release may happen today in this channel, an update... we are still working on release testing. No issues yet, but some testing has been slow across platforms and with this change, we want to be sure. We expect the release this weekend. Activation is still expected for Sunday the 23rd.
